Name: LU 79 - Zoning, 77 – 39 Vleigh Place Rezoning, Queens (C 210128 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210128 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 79).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 Courier;}{\f2\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 TimesNewRomanPSMT;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Riley\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, VP Capital Holdings\f1 ,\f0  LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 14c, by eliminating from within an existing R3-2 District a C1-2 District, changing from an R3-2 District to an R6A District, and establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-3 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of an eight-story mixed-use building with 119 residential units, 36 of which would be permanently affordable, as well as community facility and commercial uses located at 77-39 Vleigh Place in the Kew Gardens Hills neighborhood of Queens, Community District 8 (ULURP No. C 210128 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on June 13, 2022 its decision dated June 8, 2022 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 210129 ZRQ (Pre. L.U. No. 80), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on June 14, 2022;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Negative Declaration issued January 18\super th\nosupersub , 2022 (CEQR No. 21DCP063Q), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to\f2  air quality and noise\f0  (E-657) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620   \par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-657) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210128 ZMQ incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\cf1 Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf0 Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 14c:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj 1.\tab eliminating from within an existing R3-2 District a C1-2 District bounded by 77th Road, a line 150 feet easterly of Vleigh Place, 78th Avenue, and Vleigh Place;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj 2.\tab changing from an R3-2 District to an R6A\uldb B\ulnone  District property bounded by 77th Road, a line 400 feet southwesterly of Main Street, 78th Avenue, and Vleigh Place; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R6A\uldb B\ulnone  District a C2-3 District bounded by 77th Road, a line 400 feet southwesterly of Main Street, 78th Avenue, and Vleigh Place; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri54\qj\par
as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated January 18, 2022, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-657, Borough of Queens, Community District 8.\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\tx810\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on __________, 2022, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
